ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.parent, wo.taskid, wo.description, wo.assetnum, wo.location, wo.status, sd.maxvalue maxstatus, wo.inspector, wo.observation, wo.pointnum, wo.measurementvalue,wo.measuredate, wo.targstartdate, wo.targcompdate, wo.siteid, wo.workorderid, p.workorderid parentid from workorder wo join workorder p on wo.parent = p.wonum and wo.siteid = p.siteid join synonymdomain sd on wo.status = sd.value and sd.domainid = 'WOSTATUS' where wo.istask = 1 and p.historyflag = 0

Struct._value: := test( ${Done}, localCount( 'Work Order Tasks', "Parent = ${Parent} and 'Work Order' != ${Work Order} and Status != 'COMP' " ), -1 )
